alert.note: Alert for San Bernardino County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 10 at 5:55PM PST until January 10 at 10:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING ABOVE 6000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches above 6000 feet. Winds gusting to 40 mph. * WHERE...San Bernardino County Mountains. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For road condition information in California...enter 8 0 0 4 2 7 7 6 2 3 if inside california or 9 1 6 4 5 5 7 6 2 3 if outside California.
